ygData.subject: RE: Zoning Errors (RE: Frustration Story (OT - Long))
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It doesn t just happen when you die while zoning.  It also happens if you get hit by lag or get disconnected at the right moment while zoning. -- John H.
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 24 Aug 1999, Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) wrote:
>
> > >Want to hear something really bizarre? I was
> > >going through the zone to enter the Keep in
> > >Highpass and when I got through the zone, I
> > >was at the zone border that goes from Kithicor
> > >to Highpass instead of inside the Keep zone. Woops.
> >
> > Ya got hit with an undocumented feature
> > him back to his last save point."
>
> The thing is, I didn't die nor was I being attacked
> or chased. I was a few bubbles down on health due to
> a previous fight (that ended) and when I rezoned in
> the wrong place I was at full health. So that was
> nifty at least - but at the time of hitting the zone,
> I was nowhere near death and again, not being attacked.

It doesn't just happen when you die while zoning. It also
happens if you get hit by lag or get disconnected at the right
moment while zoning.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
